description.value:
You’ve learned to always keep an imperceptible aura of magic around you, reinforcing your thoughts and body and merging with the energies of your mystic arts.

While conscious, you can add your Intelligence modifier to Concentration checks. In addition, you gain each of the following bonus abilities, so long as you meet their requirements:


Requirement: The Spellarm ability.

While Spellarm is active, you are resistant to the spell’s damage type(s) (Max of 2).


Requirement: The Sword and Sorcery ability.

When you cast a cantrip with a casting time of 1 action, you can take the Self-Defense action as a minor action.


Requirement: The Impossible Stance ability.

When you are knocked @Compendium[undertaking.conditions.RK3DF56CKMQUV6DM]{Prone}, you can make a Concentration check to attempt to remain in your Fighting Stance. On a success, you can remain in your stance if you stand up before the end of your next turn.

system.requirements: Must have the Wizard Starter Abilities
